What is the focus of the Verus technology preview?
The focus of the Verus technology preview is on Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS) and Verus Reserve cross-chain currency conversion technology.

# Notable Changes
- Properly distribute initial contributions on non-reserve chains
- Show chain name on failure to notarize
- Continue attempting to notarize after running out of notary rewards
- Fix getdefinedchains currency state# Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS) and Verus Reserve cross-chain currency conversion technology -- Technology Preview
